resources.string: A unique token will be provided for you after proceeding. Your students will use this token to enroll to your class.
Provide your students with this token in order for them to enroll to this class.
You will be able to find this token later in the class information.
The class has been successfully created. Click the button to start managing it!
Check \'Authorised Absence\' if the absence has been for a valid reason.
If you check \'Absent All Day\' an absence will be added for every course of the selected day.
Students will receive notifications when the event is created and 2 hours before the event.
Before adding Courses to the Schedule, you need to create at least one Course from the Courses Page.
Before adding Grades for Students, you need to create at least one Course from the Courses Page.
Before adding Absences for Students, you need to create at least one Course from the Courses Page.
You need to create at least one Course in the Courses Page before being able to perform this action.
Enter the token provided by your teacher in order to enroll to a Class.
